name: Mexican Beef and Black Beans
description: An easy family favourite that is healthy and flavourful.
preparation: Cook beef in frying pan over medium-high heat for 5 - 8 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add bell pepper, Taco Seasoning, Salsa Mix and beans. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Divide mixture among 6 oven-safe bowls or one casserole dish, top with grated cheese and bake for 5 minutes until cheese is melted.
If desired, spoon mixture into individual tortillas.
tips: Top each serving with a spoonful of sour cream and grated cheese. Serve with Epicure Cherry Tomato Salad.
